name: Pub Penguin
description:
In this game you control our cute penguin waiter. Serve the customers ice creams, but watch out! Don't let the ice cream fall on the ground for more points and a chance at a higher stack. 

Controls

Walk: Left Joystick   /   WASD
Balancing: Right Joystick   /   Mouse

Created by team Pingwins:

- Reinard Baertsoen

- Senne De Boeck

- Casper Suetens

- Jenna Van Wezemael

- Valère Maes
